argument.name: keys
argument.description: The list of keys to delete. Can be an array of key values or an object. If the *[js:keyObj]* parameter is an object, it must define a parameter called *[js:data]* that contains the keys. See example(s) below.

page.description: Deletes data for the specified keys from Local Storage.

section.description: This example demonstrates creating an array that contains the keys:
This example demonstrate creating a object that contains the keys:
